Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

WVPlots 1.2.9 2020-08-29 Unreleased

  • Add ROCPlotPairList().

WVPlots 1.2.7 2020-08-24 2020-08-24

  • Fix ThresholdPlot boundary conditions and remove non-zero/one metrics.

WVPlots 1.2.6 2020-08-11 2020-08-11

  • Add performance plots from wvpy https://github.com/WinVector/wvpy
  • Improve documentation.
  • Change to https where possible.
  • Deal with aliased documentation links.

WVPlots 1.2.5 2020-05-01 2020-05-01

  • Work around ggplot2 to deprecating fun.y, fun.ymin, fun.ymax.
  • Work around ggplot2 variations in label data structure and NA labels.
  • Fix GainCurvePlotC color mapping issue.
  • Make more arguments to geom_smooth explicit to avoid default messages.

WVPlots 1.2.4 2020-02-19 2020-02-19

  • Fix character/factor issue (upcoming in R4.0.0).
  • Add rmarkdown suggest.
  • Badges.

WVPlots 1.2.3 2020-01-18 2020-01-19

  • Fix gini report.

WVPlots 1.2.2 2019-11-03 2019-11-03

  • Fix typo in loglog plot (and remove sig presentation).

WVPlots 1.2.1 2019-10-12 2019-10-12

  • Fix PlotDistCountBinomial.
  • More plots, adjust plots.

WVPlots 1.2.0 2019-10-03 2019-10-04

  • Bring in rqdatatable for data aggregation tasks.

WVPlots 1.1.2 2019-09-10 2019-09-12

  • Allowed palette controls on more plots.

WVPlots 1.1.1 2019-07-24 2019-07-24

  • Adjust license.

WVPlots 1.1.0 2019-04-07 2019-04-08

  • Fix no-wizard option in lift plot.

WVPlots 1.0.9 2019-02-20 2019-02-20

  • Switch to RUnit.

WVPlots 1.0.8 2019-01-26 2019-01-27

  • Add baseline in lift curve plot.
  • Truth targets.

WVPlots 1.0.7 2018-12-17 2018-12-17

  • Add PRTPlot.

WVPlots 1.0.6 2018-11-06 2018-11-06

  • Add LiftCurvePlot

WVPlots 1.0.5 2018-10-22 2018-10-22

  • Add PairPlot

WVPlots 1.0.4 2018-09-17 Unreleased

  • Documentation improvements.

WVPlots 1.0.3 2018-09-17 2018-09-17

  • Start removing frame narrowing effect where not needed.
  • ShadedDensity more controls on annotation and text.
  • Documentation improvements.

WVPlots 1.0.2 2018-07-20 2018-07-20

  • Documentation fixes.

WVPlots 1.0.1 2018-07-11 2018-07-11

  • narrow interface to sigr.
  • Documentation fixes.

WVPlots 1.0.0 2018-05-24 2018-05-25

  • Added hexbin plot.
  • Prepare for next ggplot2 version.
  • Added shadow plot.
  • Improve argument checking.
  • Add frame narrowing.
  • Make significance tests user selectable.
  • Clean up F-test in ScatterHist.

WVPlots 0.3.2 2018-05-07 2018-05-08

  • Remove RSQLite dependence.
  • Report F-test on linear fit in more cases in ScatterHist.

WVPlots 0.3.1 2018-04-03 2018-04-03

  • Remove R version dependence.
  • Speed up gain curve.
  • Make heavy weight packages suggested.

WVPlots 0.3.0 2018-03-20 2018-03-20

  • Make dependencies more flexible.
  • Remove replyr dependency.
  • Stop re-exporting wrapr functions.

WVPlots 0.2.9 2018-03-13 2018-03-13

  • Add LogLogPlot.
  • Lower dependencies.

WVPlots 0.2.8 2018-01-20 2018-01-20

  • Add new performance plot.
  • Switch to new cdata signatures.

WVPlots 0.2.7 2017-11-28 2017-11-28

  • Fix documentation fixes.
  • Switch from reshape2 to cdata.
  • Move to wrapr 1.0.2.

WVPlots 0.2.6 2017-08-28 2017-08-29

  • Fix plotly labels.

WVPlots 0.2.5 2017-07-04 2017-07-04

  • Minor documentation fixes.

WVPlots 0.2.4 2017-05-05 2017-05-05

  • More argument checking.
  • NA guard on ScatterHist.
  • plotly ROC.

WVPlots 0.2.3 2017-03-24 2017-03-24

  • Fix right-plot alignment in ScatterHist
  • Expose ROC data structures

WVPlots 0.2.2 2017-02-17 2017-02-17

  • Move debug to wrapr https://github.com/WinVector/wrapr

WVPlots 0.2.1 2017-01-17 Unreleased

  • Fix warnings.
  • Improve Imports/Depends/Suggests.
  • Fix smoothing bug in BinaryYScatterPlot.

WVPlots 0.2.0 2017-01-15 2017-01-17

  • First CRAN submission.
